Title: Relates to requiring consumer reporting agencies contact consumers when requests are made for their consumer reports
Summary: Requires that consumer reporting agencies contact consumers when a request is made for their consumer reports; requires consumer reporting agencies to provide the consumer with information pertaining to the entity that requested the consumer report.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring consumer reporting agencies to contact consumers when requests are made for their consumer reports
